wikitext.*:
'''Golf''' was a game played by [[Hobbits]]. It was invented during the [[Battle of Greenfields]] when [[Bandobras Took]] charged at the [[goblins]] and knocked off the head of king [[Golfimbul]]. The head flew through the air for 100 yards and went down a rabbit hole.<ref>{{H|Party}}</ref>
